public class Credentials

A class to transport the connection data and the logon credentials.

getConnectionID

public java.lang.String getConnectionID()
Specified by:
getConnectionID in interface ICredentials
Returns:
the ID of the actual connection. This ID should begin with the connectionDataID and contain the actual client and user.
